found.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the past tense and past participle of find
found.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to start something such as an organization, company, school, or city, often by providing the necessary money
found.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Founded in 1935 in Ohio, Alcoholics Anonymous is now a world-wide organization.
Eton College was founded by Henry VI in 1440.
found.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to melt metal and pour it into a mould (=a hollow shape), to make things such as tools and parts for machines
found.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to start a new company or organization
found.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: The company was founded back in 1947.
